mapper.sql:
where 1=1
and start_date LIKE '${month}%'
and end_date < NOW()
and start_date < NOW() AND end_date > NOW()
and start_date > NOW()
mapper.select: select id,name,start_date startDate,end_date endDate,remind,priority,remarks,create_time createTime,user_id userId from schedule where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update schedule set name = #{name}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, remind = #{remind}, priority = #{priority}, remarks = #{remarks} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(s1.id) normalFinish,COUNT(s2.id) haveInHand,COUNT(s3.id) beforeStart FROM SCHEDULE s LEFT JOIN SCHEDULE s1 ON s.id = s1.id AND s1.end_date < NOW() LEFT JOIN SCHEDULE s2 ON s.id = s2.id AND s2.start_date < NOW() AND s2.end_date > NOW() LEFT JOIN SCHEDULE s3 ON s.id = s3.id AND s3.start_date > NOW() WHERE s.start_date LIKE '${month}%'
SELECT NAME,start_date startDate FROM SCHEDULE WHERE start_date < NOW() AND start_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AND remind = '1'

SELECT start_date startDate,COUNT(id) count FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') start_date,id FROM SCHEDULE WHERE start_date > UTC_DATE() AND start_date <= DATE_ADD(UTC_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) and user_id =#{userId}) a GROUP BY start_date
